ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, One more thing I want to know from you guys... If want FRAME link as well.. I did,  treat-frames-as-embed-links: True But I want only frame Embed links,

Hey, One more thing I want to know from you guys...
   
  If want FRAME link as well..
   
  I did,  treat-frames-as-embed-links: True
   
  But I want only frame Embed links, means no other link having E in discovery path except frames...
   
  Thanks in advance...
   
  Regards,
   
  Jigar Patel

Igor Ranitovic <igor@...> wrote:
          Well, you must have a scoping issue. Something like this should work:

rejectByDefault (RejectDecideRule)
acceptIfSurtPrefixed (SurtPrefixedDecideRule)
seeds-as-surt-prefixes: true
acceptAllSeeds (SeedAcceptDecideRule)
acceptIfPrerequisite (PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule)

Other:
LinksScoper's seed-redirects-new-seed to true.

Send your order.xml over and I will look at it.

Take care,
i.

Jigar Patel wrote:
> Yes dear,
> 
> I did this,
> 
> But here what happened it just crawl its landing page [ default page ], 
> nothing else...
> 
> I think its redirected domain does not have entry in the surt file, that 
> is why it does not crawl other pages of redirected domain....
> 
> I fI put the entry of redirected domains into surt file then it crawl 
> its other pages as well...
> 
> So please solve this issue without having entry of redirected pages into 
> surt file...
> 
> Thanks in advance...
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Jigar Patel
> 
> */Igor Ranitovic <igor@...>/* wrote:
> 
> Try setting LinksScoper's seed-redirects-new-seed to true.
> 
> i.
> 
> > Hi,
> >
> > I am using SURTScope but I am facing a problem while seed is
> > rediercted to some other URL....
> >
> > Here I am using
> >
> > SurtPrefixScope:
> >
> > surts-source-file: Not provided
> > seeds-as-surt-prefixes: True
> > surts-dump-file: dump.txt
> > also-check-via: False
> >
> > if my seed is www.xyz.com and it is redirected to the www.abc.com
> > then It does not crawl www.abc.com
> >
> > But I need www.abc.com to be crawled...
> >
> > Or even my seed contains pqr.com and inturn it redirects to the
> > www.pqr.com then also it does not crawl www.pqr.com in same
> > situation...
> >
> > It works if I explicitely put those redirected host in the SURT file
> > and provide this SURT file in the surts-source-file option...
> >
> > Please help me on this.
> >
> > Regards,
> >
> > Jigar Patel
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Yahoo! Groups Links
> >
> >
> >
>
